title: Body parts and Health 1
sentences: My head hurts a lot after working so much.
Wash your hands with soap before eating.
He has blue eyes like his grandfather.
I broke my leg playing soccer yesterday.
Open your mouth; I want to see your teeth.
I feel that my heart is beating very fast.
My stomach hurts because I ate too much.
Do you have something for back pain?
The boy has very small ears.
para caminar y correr por el parque.
I use my feet to walk and run through the park.
Ella se puso una crema en el
She put a cream on her left arm.
You have very white and healthy teeth.
You have a high fever; you must go to the doctor now.
para que se me pase el dolor.
I need a pill so that the pain goes away.
por dormir en una mala posición.
My neck hurts from sleeping in a bad position.
Do you know where the nearest pharmacy is?
y no puedo ir a clase.
Today I feel very sick and I cannot go to class.
It is important to be healthy to do a lot of sports.
Blood is a bright red color.
You have very long fingers; do you play the piano?
The doctor told me that I need to rest.
My throat hurts when I talk a lot.
My grandmother has a slightly curved back.
Hacer ejercicio es muy bueno para el
Doing exercise is very good for the human body.
roja por el frío de la calle.
My nose is red from the cold on the street.
